mapper.select:
SELECT tm.account, tm.transfer, tm.balance,
gm.id, gm.receive_money_account, gm.receive, gm.remark, gm.time_of_receiving_money
FROM transfer_money tm JOIN get_money gm ON gm.receive_money_account = tm.account AND gm.receive = tm.transfer ORDER BY gm.time_of_receiving_money DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO get_money ( receive_money_account, receive, remark, time_of_receiving_money ) VALUES ( #{receiveMoneyAccount}, #{receive}, #{remark}, #{timeOfReceivingMoney} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, receive_money_account AS receiveMoneyAccount, receive, remark, time_of_receiving_money AS timeOfReceivingMoney FROM get_money WHERE id = #{id}
